resources.string:
1. 1/2 cups all-purpose flour 
 2. 3 teaspoons baking powder 
 3. 1/2 teaspoon salt 
 4. 1/2 cup white sugar 
 5. 3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder 
 6. 1 cup milk 
 7. 2 eggs 
 8. 4 tablespoons butter, melted 
 9. 1 tablespoon butter, softened 
 10. 3/4 cup confectioners' sugar 
 11. 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract 
 12. 1 teaspoon milk
